{{ error }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import {ErrorService} from '../../services/error.service' @Component({ selector: 'app-global-error', templateUrl: './global-error.component.html', styleUrls: ['./global-error.component.scss'] }) export class GlobalErrorComponent implements OnInit { constructor(public errorService: ErrorService) { } ngOnInit(): void { } }
